## Summary

I've successfully created a comprehensive mobile app for Grammy-nominated artist Afroman with the following features:

### ✅ Implemented Features:

**1. Black & Green Color Scheme**
- Background: Black (#000000)
- Primary: Lime Green (#32CD32)
- Secondary: Green (#008000)
- Accent: Green Yellow (#ADFF2F)
- All UI elements follow this theme consistently

**2. Home Screen with New Movie Finds**
- Displays "New Movie Finds" section with highlighted new content
- Shows all available movies/projects
- Subscription banner for non-premium users
- Pull-to-refresh functionality
- Clean, modern card-based design

**3. Video Player with Playback Speed Control**
- Full-screen video player using expo-video
- Custom playback controls
- Playback speed options: 0.5x, 0.75x, 1.0x, 1.25x, 1.5x, 2.0x
- Seek forward/backward (10 seconds)
- Play/pause controls
- Time display (current/total duration)

**4. Admin Login & Upload**
- Secure admin authentication
- Admin credentials: admin@afroman.com / afroman2024
- Upload interface for adding new movies/projects
- Fields: Title, Description, Video URL, Thumbnail URL, Duration
- Admin badge in profile

**5. Subscription Model ($19.99/month)**
- Premium subscription at $19.99/month
- Feature list display
- Subscription management
- Access control (premium content requires subscription)
- Subscription status in profile

**6. Additional Features**
- Profile screen with user info
- Settings section
- Logout functionality
- Responsive design for iOS and Android
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Sample movies pre-loaded for demo

### 📱 App Structure:

**Screens:**
- Home (/(tabs)/(home)/index.tsx) - Browse movies
- Profile (/(tabs)/profile.tsx) - User profile & settings
- Admin Login (/admin-login.tsx) - Admin authentication
- Admin Upload (/admin-upload.tsx) - Upload new content
- Subscription (/subscription.tsx) - Premium subscription
- Movie Player (/movie-player.tsx) - Video playback

**Key Components:**
- MovieCard - Display movie information
- FloatingTabBar - Bottom navigation
- IconSymbol - Cross-platform icons

**Utilities:**
- Storage management (expo-secure-store)
- Authentication hooks
- Movie management hooks

The app is fully functional with a clean, intuitive interface focused on ease of use. The black and green color scheme creates a distinctive brand identity for Afroman's content platform.
